text:
I'm not sure if this is the best place to post this in Slack, but my team is developing a new site and I'm stuck on something. I'm not a skilled developer... I'm more of a designer but have been tasked with the build. :slightly_smiling_face:

We need a form field that requests info from the user, such as First Name, then moves the user to the next field, then the next, one field at time. We don't want the user to see a long form displayed. We want one question/entry at a time, with a progress bar showing percent completion.

Is there a HubSpot tool/module available for this? Or do I need to use something like Typeform? We're trying to imitate what is seen on the Baby Bathwater <https://babybathwater.com/nominate-a-guest/|website>.
